title: Sodom: A Nation On Its Knees
description: God is not pleased with the choices made by the great nation of the United States to the point where He's ready to destroy it. Wanting to give the people one last chance, He decides to send His angels, Michael and Gabriel, on a quest to find 5,000 righteous living within the nation. If they succeed, God will not destroy the US as He did the city of Sodom. Will His angels succeed? Will Michael and Gabriel find even one righteous living among all the wickedness? Join Michael and Gabriel on a quest that will have you on the edge-of-your seat wondering what will happen next.
author: Pam Funke
